Day 1.topics: Static Demographics + Sleep Quality Core + PSQI (Part 1)
Day 1.notes: Foundation: Basic demographics & sleep quality overview. Gateway questions included.

Day 2.notes: PSQI completion + sleep patterns (weekday vs weekend, bedtimes, wake times)

Day 3.topics: Sleep Timing + Mental Health + Cognitive Gateways
Day 3.notes: Light exposure, screens, mental health & cognitive function gateways

Day 4.notes: OSA screening, pain assessment, exercise habits, metabolic health basics

Day 5.notes: Caffeine, alcohol, diet impacts, social sleep factors, stress level. CORE COMPLETE.

Day 7.notes: If insomnia gateway = YES. Dysfunctional beliefs assessment (first half)

Day 8.notes: If insomnia gateway = YES. Complete beliefs + start sleep hygiene habits

Day 9.notes: If insomnia gateway = YES. Complete hygiene + start pre-sleep arousal

Day 10.notes: Complete pre-sleep arousal. ESS if daytime sleepiness gateway triggered

Day 11.notes: If daytime sleepiness gateway = YES. Fatigue scale + functional outcomes

Day 12.notes: Complete functional outcomes. Start mental health if gateways triggered

Day 13.notes: Complete anxiety screen. Start comprehensive mental health + cognitive function

Day 14.notes: Complete DASS-21. OSA screening if gateway triggered (snoring/apnea observed)

Day 15.topics: EXPANSION: Brief Pain Inventory + MEDAS + MEQ (as needed)
Day 15.notes: Pain (if ≥4/10), diet (if impacts sleep), chronotype (if >1hr variability). Flexible completion day.
